author: Nathaniel Taplin
title: The West Can't Contain. Should You Shelter in China?
description: The West Can't Contain. Should You Shelter in China? (Third column, 16th story, link ) Related stories: Iran Imprisoning Corona Whistleblowers... 'We are collapsing': Virus pummels medics in Spain and Italy... Brazil's Bolsonaro: It's just 'a little cold'... …
content: Western politicians spent January and February excoriating Beijing for its disastrous early attempts to suppress public discussion of the coronavirus. Now Europeans and Americans are paying for their own politicians refusal to acknowledge the threat, while Ch… [+271 chars]
